FuncDef: This command sets the speed of the DS-0 channels used in the associated channel-group.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that 56k byte (7-bits per byte) encoding will be used for the associated DS-0 channels. This channel speed value is only supported on the m4-chds3-as and m12-chds3-as MDAs and on DS-1 channels (ESF and SF framing) and not on E-1 (G.704) channels.
Specifies that 64k byte (8-bits per byte) encoding will be used for the associated DS-0 channels.
